content:
Lekishon and the 
 cows 
 
 Paul Maseri 
 English 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 This is Lekishon. 
 
 
 
 Lekishon is caling 
 
 his dog. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Lekishon and his dog 
 
 are going to graze 
 
 the animals. 
 
 
 
 The sun is hot. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Lekishon and his dog 
 
 are thirsty and hungry. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 They go to lok 
 
 for water. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Lekishon loses track 
 
 of his cows. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 5  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Lekishon starts to cry. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 He decides to go 
 
 home with his dog. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 7  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The cows found 
 
 the way home! 
 
 
 
 Lekishon and his dog 
 
 are very hapy. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 8
